title: Textile
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Serpentine branch with large exotic blossoms in orange, green, yellow and purple. Large scrolling leaves in browns, purple and yellow. Design after an 18th century Indian Painted cotton. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Medium: block-printed linen. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-13.
